tag_config.name: lgbtq
tag_config.description:
Legislation related to lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, and gender non-conforming people, including:
- Legal rights and protections for sexual orientation, gender identity, and gender expression
- Anti-discrimination measures in employment, housing, education, healthcare, and public services
- Marriage equality, domestic partnerships, civil unions, and adoption rights for same-sex couples
- Policies addressing harassment, bullying, and hate crimes targeting LGBTQ+ individuals
- Bans or restrictions on conversion therapy and gender-affirming healthcare
- Transgender rights regarding bathroom access, participation in sports, and changing identification documents
- Religious exemptions or freedom laws affecting LGBTQ+ rights
- Recognition of non-binary or intersex status in legal or governmental contexts
examples: Expands anti-discrimination protections to include sexual orientation and gender identity
Allows transgender individuals to change gender markers on IDs
Transgender student bathroom and sports participation policies
negative_examples: Equal pay for women in the workplace
Domestic violence shelters and services for women
Women's healthcare and cervical cancer screening

text_cache.c663a26aecd526fb4f5c6e41e4892ee2721bee20: AN ACT to amend and reenact section 15.1-06-21 of the North Dakota Century Code, relating to transgender student accommodations and restroom use in public schools; to provide a penalty; and to declare an emergency. Relating to transgender student accommodations and restroom use in public schools; to provide a penalty; and to declare an emergency. summary 69 ~{"classification": "lower"} Reported back from conference committee, in place of, placed on calendar HB 1144
